text: Michel Jacques François Achard (14 October 1778 – 6 January 1865) was a French general de brigade (brigadier general). He was a member of the Chamber of Peers under the July Monarchy, a member of the National Legislative Assembly of the French Second Republic and a member of the Senate of the Second French Empire. == Honours == * Grand Cross of the Legion of Honour * knight of the Order of Saint Louis * 1833: Commander of the Order of Leopold.Royal order of 18.04.1833 ==References== == Books== * * Category:1778 births Category:1865 deaths Category:Grand Croix of the Légion d'honneur Category:Knights of the Order of Saint Louis Category:Members of the Chamber of Peers of the July Monarchy Category:French Senators of the Second Empire Category:Members of the National Legislative Assembly of the French Second Republic Category:Place of birth missing
title: Michel Jacques François Achard
